paper_abstract: The general nonlinear matrix equation X + A*X(-q)A=Q(q >= 1) is investigated. Some sufficient conditions and necessary conditions for the existence of a (unique) positive definite solution are given. An iterative method is proposed to compute positive definite solutions. Crown Copyright (C) 2008 Published by Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On the nonlinear matrix equation X plus A*X(-q)A=Q(q >= 1)
